com.pstmetro.gui.containers

Class JourneyBar

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.inlustra.gui.elements.CanvasElement
      • com.inlustra.gui.containers.CanvasContainer
        • com.inlustra.gui.containers.AnimatedContainer
          • com.pstmetro.gui.containers.JourneyBar
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.inlustra.gui.mouse.CanvasMouseListener, Comparable<com.inlustra.gui.elements.CanvasElement>

    public class JourneyBar
extends com.inlustra.gui.containers.AnimatedContainer
    The journey bar is used in displaying the journey to take after the user has selected it.

    • Constructor Detail

      • JourneyBar

        public JourneyBar(MetroMap map,
          int x,
          int y,
          int width,
          int height)
        Create a new CanvasContainer while pulling in the MetroMap for use with drawing.
        Parameters:
        map - MetroMap to be used for drawing and retrieving node details.
        x - X location of the absolutely positioned container.
        y - Y location of the absolutely positioned container.
        width - Width of the absolutely positioned container.
        height - Height of the absolutely positioned container.
